Plan Details

Premium Service

  • Trustee Account Management
  • 1000 contacts
  • Unlimited:
    • SMS Messaging & timed delivery
    • Audio/Voice Recording & capsuled delivery
    • Video Recording & capsuled delivery
    • Password and important documentation archive

Coming Soon:

  • Estate Planning basic documents and guidelines
  • Referral Services
  • Custom solutions

Last Messages is a free service for up to 5 messages and up to 10MB of low resolution video storage. For Premium users, all features are available for: $2.99/month $30.00/year $300 for lifetime usage Each account can hold up to 1,000 contacts and 100GB of storage. Additional storage plans upon request.

Active duty military and first responders (fire and police) will always have free access to the premium version of Last Messages. Simply provide your current information and ID in an email to activeduty@lastmessages.com as well as your account ID and we will unlock all features and storage.
